connector.description:
Query data from a MySQL Database.

In your Pipe file, you must explicitly declare the SQL Server driver dependency in spec->integration->dependencies.

- "mvn:mysql:mysql-connector-java:<version>"

camel.kamelet.mysql-source.serverName.name: camel.kamelet.mysql-source.serverName
camel.kamelet.mysql-source.serverName.description: The server name for the data source. Example: localhost

camel.kamelet.mysql-source.serverPort.name: camel.kamelet.mysql-source.serverPort
camel.kamelet.mysql-source.serverPort.description: The server port for the data source.

camel.kamelet.mysql-source.username.name: camel.kamelet.mysql-source.username
camel.kamelet.mysql-source.username.description: The username to access a secured MySQL Database.

camel.kamelet.mysql-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.mysql-source.password
camel.kamelet.mysql-source.password.description: The password to access a secured MySQL Database.

camel.kamelet.mysql-source.query.name: camel.kamelet.mysql-source.query
camel.kamelet.mysql-source.query.description: The query to execute against the MySQL Database. Example: INSERT INTO accounts (username,city) VALUES (:#username,:#city)

camel.kamelet.mysql-source.databaseName.name: camel.kamelet.mysql-source.databaseName
camel.kamelet.mysql-source.databaseName.description: The name of the MySQL Database.

camel.kamelet.mysql-source.consumedQuery.name: camel.kamelet.mysql-source.consumedQuery
camel.kamelet.mysql-source.consumedQuery.description: A query to run on a tuple consumed. Example: DELETE FROM accounts where user_id = :#user_id

camel.kamelet.mysql-source.delay.name: camel.kamelet.mysql-source.delay
camel.kamelet.mysql-source.delay.description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll
